headline.text: Opinion: Want to make an impact on your community? Do more than vote.

article1.author: Sonja Neve
article1.blurb:
Missing the election doesn’t have to be the end of their potential for activism. Students can take action on issues throughout the year — not just during election season. 

Feelings of discontent are especially prescient now, as recent decisions by the College Park City Council have shown a disconnect between decision makers and students.

headline.text: Opinion: Institutions enable the abuse of students

article2.author: Hadron Chaudhary
article2.blurb:
Mandatory reporting policies are designed to stop professors and other authority figures from ignoring misconduct. 

Yet that rarely happens — academia fails to give students adequate ways to respond to abuse by professionals in their field.
